name: SpaceShootPlatforming
description:
A (demo) level for a co-op game idea I've been working on over the last year. It's way shorter than I originally planned, but I still like how it turned out.  

Controls: 

Player 1 (Keyboard): WASD - Move, CRTL - Ground Pound

Player 2 (Mouse): LMB - Shoot horizontally, RMB - Shoot vertically
